name: "You can Keep the Change"
description:
"You can Keep the Change " was made in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020 by two people. 

"R" will reset the game if something bugs out (:

It's your first day working as cashier. How many people can you get checked out before the day is over?

This is just a demo, but I plan to add more things in the future (hopefully). Have fun!
